City Council
============

Meetings
========

* City Council Meets every 2nd & 4th Monday of the month at 6:00 pm
* Agenda & Minutes can be found by [CLICKING HERE](https://www.dalharttx.gov/AgendaCenter).
* Agendas are uploaded 72 hours or more prior to meeting.  Minutes are uploaded after next following meeting after approval
* Videos can be found by [CLICKING HERE](https://www.dalharttx.gov/AgendaCenter) and are also located on our Youtube channel [HERE](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCoduhttCF8VPPljqr4tpZzQ).  Videos are uploaded after meeting or by next business day.
* LIVE meeting video can be accessed at the top of the page.  On meeting days a red watch live button will be visible.

[**Council Ward Map**](https://www.dalharttx.gov/DocumentCenter/View/365/Dalhart-Final-Map)
